author: Angela Watercutter
title: Disney Is Donating 100,000 N95 Masks to Covid-19 Relief
description: Meanwhile, J.K. Rowling has some new treats for Potterheads stuck quarantining at home.
content: Hello, and welcome to another edition of The Monitor, WIREDs entertainment news roundup. Once again, the coronavirus is dominating the conversation in the pop culture world. Who's talking about it? Well, Elton John, J.K. Rowling, and Disney, for starters. Let… [+1648 chars]
